Uses of Package
com.cyc.session.exception

  • Packages that use com.cyc.session.exception 
    Package Description
    com.cyc.core.service
    Core API service loader support.
    com.cyc.kb
    Interfaces for manipulating CycL-based java objects, both for the purpose of making assertions and for retrieving terms and values via simple queries.
    com.cyc.query
    Interfaces for asking arbitrarily complex queries of a Cyc server, and processing the answers.
    com.cyc.query.spi
    All Query API service provider interfaces.
    com.cyc.session
    Interfaces for configuring and managing connections to a Cyc server.
    com.cyc.session.exception
    Session API exception hierarchy.
    com.cyc.session.selection
    Provides an arbitrary set of criteria to select a subset of CycSession objects.
    com.cyc.session.spi
    All Session API service provider interfaces.
  • Classes in com.cyc.session.exception used by com.cyc.core.service 
    Class and Description
    SessionServiceException
    SessionServiceException occur when the Session API has trouble loading a service provider.
  • Classes in com.cyc.session.exception used by com.cyc.kb 
    Class and Description
    SessionException
    SessionApiException is the base exception which indicates that an application library has encountered a problem in interacting with a Cyc server.
  • Classes in com.cyc.session.exception used by com.cyc.query 
    Class and Description
    OpenCycUnsupportedFeatureException
    Indicates that a particular piece of functionality is categorically unsupported by OpenCyc servers.
    SessionCommunicationException
    SessionCommunicationException indicates that an application library encountered a problem when attempting to communicate with a Cyc server.
    UnsupportedCycOperationException
    Thrown to indicate that a Cyc server does not support a particular operation.
  • Classes in com.cyc.session.exception used by com.cyc.query.spi 
    Class and Description
    UnsupportedCycOperationException
    Thrown to indicate that a Cyc server does not support a particular operation.
  • Classes in com.cyc.session.exception used by com.cyc.session 
    Class and Description
    SessionCommandException
    SessionCommandException indicates that Session implementation code could communicate with a Cyc server, but encountered a problem issuing a command or interpreting a result.
    SessionCommunicationException
    SessionCommunicationException indicates that an application library encountered a problem when attempting to communicate with a Cyc server.
    SessionConfigurationException
    CycSessionException indicates that a Cyc session has been mis-configured or not been configured at all.
    SessionInitializationException
    SessionInitializationException indicates that a problem was encountered when initializing a CycSession.
    SessionServiceException
    SessionServiceException occur when the Session API has trouble loading a service provider.
  • Classes in com.cyc.session.exception used by com.cyc.session.exception 
    Class and Description
    SessionException
    SessionApiException is the base exception which indicates that an application library has encountered a problem in interacting with a Cyc server.
    SessionRuntimeException
    SessionApiRuntimeException is the base runtime exception which indicates that an application library has encountered a problem in interacting with a Cyc server.
    UnsupportedCycOperationException
    Thrown to indicate that a Cyc server does not support a particular operation.
  • Classes in com.cyc.session.exception used by com.cyc.session.selection 
    Class and Description
    SessionException
    SessionApiException is the base exception which indicates that an application library has encountered a problem in interacting with a Cyc server.
  • Classes in com.cyc.session.exception used by com.cyc.session.spi 
    Class and Description
    SessionCommunicationException
    SessionCommunicationException indicates that an application library encountered a problem when attempting to communicate with a Cyc server.
    SessionConfigurationException
    CycSessionException indicates that a Cyc session has been mis-configured or not been configured at all.
    SessionInitializationException
    SessionInitializationException indicates that a problem was encountered when initializing a CycSession.
